Package com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheapstruct

Long sized off-heap collections of "structs" (memory areas with equal sizes) with sorting and searching support

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
OffHeapStructAccessor Interface for accessing fields of a single struct
OffHeapStructCollection Base interface for off-heap struct (memory areas of equal sizes) collection.
 

Class Summary
OffHeapStructArray Implementation of off-heap array of structs (memory areas of equal sizes).
OffHeapStructArrayList Implementation of off-heap array list of structs (memory areas of equal sizes).
OffHeapStructBinarySearch Binary search implementation borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/Arrays.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection
OffHeapStructBinarySearch.IndexRange OffHeapStructCollection index range representation.
OffHeapStructBinarySearchWithComparator Binary search implementation borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/Arrays.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection with comparators.
OffHeapStructByteArrayAccessor Struct's accessor implementation for byte array structs
OffHeapStructComparator Internal wrapper for user-provided comparator
OffHeapStructIndexAccessor Struct's accessor implementation for off-heap stored structs
OffHeapStructIterator Iterator implementation for unsafe long collections.
OffHeapStructSorter alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection.
OffHeapStructSorterByte alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection with signed byte keys.

OffHeapStructSorterShort alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection with signed short keys.
OffHeapStructSorterUnsignedByte alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection with unsigned byte keys.
OffHeapStructSorterUnsignedInt alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection with unsigned int keys.
OffHeapStructSorterUnsignedLong alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection with unsigned long keys.
OffHeapStructSorterUnsignedShort alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection with unsigned short keys.
OffHeapStructSorterWithComparator alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection with comparator.
OffHeapStructSortKey Struct sort key class to use for sorting with multiple keys
OffHeapStructSortKey.ByteKey Struct sort key implementation, uses signed byte comparison on specified struct offset
OffHeapStructSortKey.IntKey Struct sort key implementation, uses signed int comparison on specified struct offset
OffHeapStructSortKey.LongKey Struct sort key implementation, uses signed long comparison on specified struct offset
OffHeapStructSortKey.ShortKey Struct sort key implementation, uses signed short comparison on specified struct offset
OffHeapStructSortKey.UnsignedByteKey Struct sort key implementation, uses unsigned byte comparison on specified struct offset
OffHeapStructSortKey.UnsignedIntKey Struct sort key implementation, uses unsigned int comparison on specified struct offset
OffHeapStructSortKey.UnsignedLongKey Struct sort key implementation, uses unsigned long comparison on specified struct offset
OffHeapStructSortKey.UnsignedShortKey Struct sort key implementation, uses unsigned short comparison on specified struct offset
 

Package com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheapstruct Description

Long sized off-heap collections of "structs" (memory areas with equal sizes) with sorting and searching support

This package contains implementations of fixed-sized array of "structs" (OffHeapStructArray) and growing array list of structs (OffHeapStructArrayList). Both classes are implemented on top of OffHeapMemory.

Structs

Struct here means a memory area (located in off-heap memory or loaded into byte array) of limited size with predefined locations of primitive "fields" in it. Such memory areas may be used like C structs (this library doesn't enforce memory alighment so they are more alike to packed C structs).

Features

  • long indexes (size is not bounded by Integer.MAX_VALUE)
  • GC doesn't know about allocated memory so you can allocate gigabytes of memory without additional load on GC
  • memory may be freed to OS eagerly (it's not mandatory, OffHeapMemory will free allocated memory when it's instance will be garbage collected)

Iterators

Both collections implements Iterable returning elements copying it into one predefined byte array.

Operations

  • reading/writing primitives directly from/into off-heap memory without copying full structs into byte arrays
  • sorting using OffHeapStructSorter: implementation of Dual-Pivot quicksort algorithm adapted to off-heap collections. May use arbitrary fields from struct as sort keys with signed or unsigned comparison. May also use user-provided Comparator's for structs.
  • binary search over sorted collections using OffHeapStructBinarySearch. May use arbitrary field from struct to search on it. May also use user-provided Comparator's for structs.
  • binary search returning ranges of equal values: OffHeapStructBinarySearch.binarySearchRangeByLongKey(com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheapstruct.OffHeapStructCollection, long, int, com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheapstruct.OffHeapStructBinarySearch.IndexRange)

Usage example in tests (github links)

  • array
  • array list
  • sorting
  • binary search
